articles.author: Liverpool
articles.title: Jordan Henderson: Premier League trophy win without fans would be 'pretty strange'
articles.description: Playing at Anfield and lifting the Premier League trophy without any fans will be pretty strange, says Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson.
articles.content: Liverpool and other clubs returned to training last week with strict protocols in place, including training only in small groups, but Henderson said the measures are amazing and made the players feel safe… [+15122 chars]

articles.author: Arsenal
articles.title: Arsenal Women fined by FA over autistic coach's dismissal
articles.description: FA fines Women's Super League club £50,000 and will require some members of staff to undertake education programme
articles.content: The Women's Super League club had denied that its dismissal of U15 coach Robin Carpenter was an act of discrimination by reason of disability, but an independent regulatory… [+1542 chars]
